definition: to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: They were rioting all night after the boat race.
The river banks were lined with people watching the boat race.
sentences.chinese: 河两岸站满了观看赛船的人群。

sentences.english: He has already been the champion of the boat race three times.
sentences.chinese: 他已经夺得过三次赛船大会的冠军了。
他担任牛津大学赛船的掌舵人。

sentences.english: Haining boat racing, player and on board for martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 海宁赛船，选手兼在船上作武术表演。

sentences.english: On boat race night, the college stds paint the town red.
sentences.chinese: 赛船之夜，大学生们异常兴奋，喧哗不已。

sentences.english: You'll watch boat races and swimming competitions.
sentences.chinese: 你们将看到赛船和游泳比赛。

sentences.english: A new type device for fixing and starting racing boats is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新型赛船固定启航装置。

sentences.english: The red racing boat crossed the finish line first.
sentences.chinese: 那条红色的赛船第一个冲过了终点线。

sentences.english: In horse riding, shooting, and boat racing, they may compete in the same events as the men.
sentences.chinese: 骑马，射击，赛船，仍是只要汉子们能够参与的竞赛。

sentences.english: He is training for the boat-race.

definition: dragon boat (used at 端午[Duan1 wu3], the Dragon Boat Festival)
stand-up paddleboarding (SUP)/stand-up paddleboard/blade of a propeller/blade of an oar
